extDesc.message: This is an unrelated version of BTTV for VKontakte.

aboutBttvLink.description: Text in the link to original BTTV.

aboutText.message: "BTTV for VKontakte" addon provides emote display in messages tab. There will be more functionality in the future to improve overall VKontakte experience and you can help me at

aboutGithubLink.description: Text in the link to "BTTV for VKontakte" github repository.

settingsGifsDesc.message: — Adds animated emotes (not everyone likes GIFs, but most people do)

settingsMenuDesc.message: — Enables a more advanced emote menu for VKontakte

settingsFrankerzDesc.message: — Enables emotes from that other extension people usually use

settingsPredictedDesc.message: — Shows list of emotes that starts with the same word you entered

privacyPolicy.message: This addon does NOT use, collect or share any of your personal information except settings provided in this popup settings tab.

donationText1.message: Want to help and motivate me to improve this addon?
donationText1.description: First text part for popup donations tab

donationText2.message: Make a donation via Yandex Money.
donationText2.description: Second text part for popup donations tab
